email.title: DoCSoc Discord server now live!
email.text:
### The DoCSoc Discord server is finally here!
It is now available to join at: https://discord.gg/t45Szv3
With the upcoming first term being so different, this server will provide a platform for you to chat and game with your fellow DoCSoc peers. It also will also allow you to ask for help with any programming or theory problems you might have!

### What is Discord?
For those of you who donâ€™t know, Discord is an app that allows you to communicate with people over voice, video and text.
